page.title: 17Arts and Crafts in Upton.
page.content: Upton has a flourishing{arts and {crafts society}who arrange amoung other things an exhibition in Upton Church of local work. A local{weaver has a workshop where visitors can watch her at work. On the waterfront a local{artist}has a studio where he paints pictures of boats in oils. In Court Street is Anemone Studios where beautiful{porcelain flowers}are painted. In the town there is a good {art shop}which supplies materials for the many visiting artists. Craft markets are organised twice a year in the Memorial Hall.
